Item.name: Blood Punch
Item.description: Trick is to pinch your nose when you pop this open and swallow fast!

Item.name: Crispy Chitin Bits
Item.description: If one of the pieces is tougher to chew than the rest, uppercut yourself to break it apart.

Item.name: Expert Mechanic Outfit
Item.description: Pockets and damage protection. Rich mechanic's clothes.

Item.name: Expert Engineer Outfit
Item.description: Pockets and damage protection. Rich engineer's clothes.

Item.name: Expert Medic Outfit
Item.description: This suit has a syringe gun holder, kevlar and protects against fire and husk infection.

Item.name: Craw-Yum!
Item.description: Don't look into the bowl when you are eating this and try to burn your tongue a little so you can ignore the taste.
